rooms.description: Art Deco style living room with elegant geometric patterns, rich colors, and floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural light. The room overlooks the landscaped garden and has a direct view to the private gym area.
Modern dining space complementing the Art Deco design with metallic accents and art deco lighting fixtures. Connects seamlessly with the living room.
Contemporary kitchen designed in Art Deco style featuring streamlined cabinetry and integrated appliances. Includes a small prep area that overlooks an indoor herb garden.
Spacious master bedroom with opulent finishes reflecting Art Deco motifs, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a walk-in closet. Adjacent to a private bathroom with Vastu-aligned water element.
Cozy child bedroom designed with vibrant Art Deco patterns and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Positioned in the northeast quadrant as per Vastu for positive energy.
Guest bedroom incorporating Art Deco design elements with comfortable seating area and natural light from large windows. Includes a small en-suite bathroom following Vastu guidelines.

Dedicated private gym with ample space for equipment and ventilation. The design incorporates open space, reflective surfaces to enhance brightness, and is aligned according to Vastu principles by being in the south-west quadrant.
Minimalist study area with integrated storage and desk space designed for concentration. The room has controlled lighting and a window positioned to receive morning light as per Vastu.

openings.description: Ornate Art Deco styled door with geometric patterns serving as the main entrance aligned with the positive energy flow as per Vastu.
Functional service entrance for utility access and deliveries.
Staircase leading to the rooftop terrace designed with Art Deco balustrades, providing secure access and a transition from indoors to outdoors.

additional_features.description: Expansive rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and entertainment. Features floor-to-ceiling glass railings, integrated planters, and seating areas that align with Vastu principles to promote balance and harmony.
